title: Agile Project Management Professional
subtitle: Mastering agile methodologies and iterative project delivery
description: Master agile project management including Scrum framework implementation, sprint planning, team collaboration, continuous improvement, and agile transformation for successful iterative project delivery.

certification.name: Agile Project Management Professional (APMP)
certification.authority: The National Society of Business Sciences

learningOutcomes: Implement comprehensive agile project management frameworks
Lead Scrum teams and sprint planning sessions
Facilitate agile ceremonies and continuous improvement
Manage stakeholder collaboration in agile environments
